result.execSummary:
On one or more charges, the deferred prosecution or sentencing agreement(s) on this case were fulfilled, and the charge(s) were dismissed.

The defendant Robert A Gerlach was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 4th Degree Sexual Assault, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(3m).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: $265.60 fine/cost to be paid to Probation while on Probation.  Failure to pay may result in a civil judgment.
$200.00 DNA surcharge to be paid to Probation while on Probation.  Failure to pay may result in a civil judgment.

Must provide DNA sample.
Must undergo Sexual Deviancy evaluation & comply with recommendations.
Must register as a Sex Offender for 15 years.
Must complete an AODA assessment & comply with recommendations.

timeConds.notes:
30 days to be served beginning 8/01/2017.
30 days to be served beginning 8/01/2018.
Subject to Work Release.  NOT subject to Good Time.
May serve time in another county or in Minnesota as long as there is no cost to Polk County.

Defendant Robert A Gerlach in court with attorney Patrick Linnae Cotter.  Daniel Patrick Steffen appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  CW-clerk 8:38 am.
Amended Information filed.  Count 1-guilty.  CT-accepts plea, adj guilty but do NOT enter judgment.  DJOC filed with the court.   Count 2-guilty.  CT accepts plea, adj guilty & judgment entered.  9:29 am recess.  9:58 am back on the record.
SENTENCE (Count 2)-w/h, probation up to 2 yrs.  60 days Jail-30 days served in Aug 1, 2017 then 30 days in Aug 1, 2018.  Subj to WR, may serve in another county or in MN as long as no cost to Polk Co.  No good time.  $265.60 fine/costs.  $200 surcharge.  Must provide DNA sample.  All payable thru probation, ftp-judgment.  AODA & compliance.  Undergo sexual deviancy eval & comply.  Must report to probation today.  CT is ordering SO registry for 15 years.  No contact with JMT.  PCR.  10:21 am adj.
